borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1 Japanese Maple (Acer palmatum) - Remove to allow replanting.G59 Red Oak (Quercus rubra)  - Remove major deadwood over 25mm dia. and/or over 1m length. Prune to give 1m clearance from signage to S. T66 Red Oak (Quercus rubra)  - Prune to give 0.5m clearance to pole/cctv.T3 Magnolia stellata  - Thorough deadwood removal. T44 Japanese Maple (Acer palmatum)  - Remove smallest diameter stem with included union at base. Prune to give around 0.25m clearance from balcony.G45 Lime (Tilia cordata)  - Prune to give 0.5m clearance to balconies and lamp columns. T56 Wild Cherry (Prunus avium) - Prune to give around 0.5m clearance from cctv cameras.T71 Wild Cherry (Prunus avium)  - Prune to give around 0.5m clearance from bridge/building.T79 Wild Cherry (Prunus avium)  - Prune to give 0.5m clearance to cctv pole. T113 Wild Cherry (Prunus avium)  - Prune to give 0.5m clearance to pole/cctv.T6 Magnolia stellata  - Prune to give 2.5m ground clearance over stairs. T22 Tilia sp.  - Prune to give 0.25m clearance from pergola.T38 Lime (Tilia cordata)  - Consider removal and replanting with smaller species.T42 Japanese Maple (Acer palmatum)  - Prune to give around 0.5m clearance from balcony.T48 Pear (Pyrus communis)  - Prune to give around 0.5m clearance from lamp column.T51 Pear (Pyrus communis)  - Prune to give 0.5m clearance to lamp column. G67 Persian Ironwood (Parotia persica) & Pear (Pyrus sp.)  - Reduce crowns by around 1-1.5m to maintain best compact form and reduce end weight acting on weaker unions.T68 Hornbeam (Carpinus betulus) - Prune to give around 1m clearance from lamp column.T129 Silver Birch (Betula pendula)  - Prune to give 0.5m clearance from balcony.G132 Wild Cherry (Prunus avium)  - Remove cane from crown.
